# CUI Widgets

## Overview
CUI headers define UI widget types and helpers for building in-game UI.

## Key Headers
- `cui.h`, `cuitypes.h`
- `cuiwidget.h`, `cuiwindow.h`
- `cuibase.h` and widget variants (buttons, sliders, lists, etc.)

## Reference
- cui.h
- cuitypes.h
- cuiwidget.h
- cuiwindow.h
- cuibase.h
- cuibutton.h
- cuislider.h
- cuilist.h
- cuidropdownlist.h
- cuioption.h
- cuiprogress.h
- cuicheck.h
- cuistatictext.h
- cuistaticimage.h
- cuifont.h
- cuipolystring.h
- cuiformattedpolystring.h
